
### arbitrary memory write  {.smaller}


* bunch of scenarios that lead to <em>single arbitrary memory write</em>
* typical result: arbitrary code execution
* how? 
<hr class="vspace" />
* [overwrite existing machine code (insert jump?)]{.fragment fragment-index=3 .custom .myem-only} 

   * problem: usually not writable

* [overwrite return address directly]{.fragment fragment-index=4 .custom .myem-only} 

   * observation: don't care about stack canaries --- skip them

* [overwrite other function pointer?]{.fragment fragment-index=5 .custom .myem-only}
* [overwrite another data pointer --- copy more?]{.fragment fragment-index=6 .custom .myem-only}
